```rs
let alphabet: Vec<_> = (b'A' .. b'z' + 1) // Start as u8
.map(|c| c as char)            // Convert all to chars
.filter(|c| c.is_alphabetic()) // Filter only alphabetic chars
.collect(); // Collect as Vec<char>
```

```rs
name abraham
age 49
fav_colour red
hello world
(press 'Ctrl Z' on Windows or 'Ctrl D' on Unix)
```
